markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Rakshasa](/Traits.aspx?ID=768)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 363 <sup>1.1</sup>

Rakshasas are divine spirits who exemplify the profane. They can typically Change Shape and have a weakness to holy.
name: Rakshasa
